statements: DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE value < 0.5 AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM forecasts WHERE predicted_value <= 50 OR forecast_date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM forecast_model WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression';
DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE age > 40 AND name LIKE 'A%';
